resources.string:
This app allows you to use your hardware HOME button with integrated fingerprint sensor on Samsung Galaxy devices (Android 7.0+) as a capacitive HOME button.

App service runs in foreground and monitors touches of the fingerprint sensor. When touch is detected, it works like pressing the HOME button physically. The service is paused when screen is off and has no battery impact. This app uses Samsung fingerprint SDK.

You can also use Quick Settings Tile (Android 7+ feature) to quickly toggle the service on/off if needed - use it to temporary disable the service in case you need to authenticate with your fingerprint in any app. Before adding quick settings tile to the notification bar, please open the app and run the service first.
